rules.demoDescription: Start with a demo account to practice and showcase your trading skills without risking real capital.

rules.riskManagementDescription: Adhere strictly to the maximum drawdown limits of 10% to ensure responsible risk management and preserve your capital.
rules.finalBalanceDescription: Achieve a minimum profit target while maintaining consistent trading performance during the challenge period.
rules.tradingRulesComplianceDescription: Follow all trading rules and guidelines consistently throughout the challenge duration.

questions.question: What trading instruments are available?
questions.answer: You will have access to major forex pairs, popular cryptocurrencies, and leading stock indices. All trades are executed with virtual funds in a demo account.

questions.question: Are there participation fees?
questions.answer: Yes, there is a small entry fee to ensure serious participation. This fee contributes to the prize pool and helps maintain the competition's quality.

questions.question: How are winners determined?
questions.answer: Winners are ranked based on their final account balance while adhering to all trading rules and risk management guidelines. Additional metrics such as risk-adjusted returns may be considered for tie-breaks.

questions.question: How can I join the tournament?
questions.answer: Simply click the 'Join Tournament' button, complete the registration process, and pay the entry fee. You will receive your demo account credentials immediately upon confirmation.

sections.generalDescriptionContent: This trading contest is organized to test and showcase trading skills in a competitive environment. Participants must be of legal age in their jurisdiction to participate.
eligibilityList: Participants must be at least 18 years old.
They must have a valid email address.
They must complete the registration process and pay the entry fee.
They must comply with all local laws and regulations.
contestRulesList: Trading must be conducted within the specified contest period.
Only designated trading pairs are allowed.
The use of automated trading systems or bots is prohibited.
Market manipulation tactics are strictly prohibited.
Participants must use their own trading account.
sections.prizeDistributionContent: Prizes will be distributed based on final rankings. The organizer reserves the right to verify all trading activities before distributing the prizes.
sections.disqualificationIntro: The organizer reserves the right to disqualify any participant who:
disqualificationList: Attempts to manipulate the contest results.
sections.liabilityContent: Participants acknowledge that trading involves risk, and the organizer is not responsible for any losses incurred during the contest.
sections.termsChangesContent: The organizer reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Participants will be notified of any changes.
